sculptures.title: Venus de Milo

artists.name: Michelangelo
artists.bio: An Italian sculptor, painter, architect, and poet of the High Renaissance.

artists.name: Auguste Rodin
artists.bio: A French sculptor known as the progenitor of modern sculpture.

artists.name: Unknown Greek Artist
artists.bio: The creator behind the timeless beauty of Venus de Milo remains a mystery.
